title: ICE / ANDRE WHITE CHECKS
description: this is where andre's two white checks are -- "try to logic and figure out what they're hiding/planning" and "JUST DANCE"

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "You close your eyes and vacate your..."
dialogueTree.text: You close your eyes and vacate your skull, leaving your brain to wonder: where did that little fluttering light go?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "TOTAL DARKNESS! You sink down the d..."
links.text: TOTAL DARKNESS! You sink down the darkest fathoms of your own personal deep, vertebrae by vertebrae -- THROUGH THE UNFORMED SKULLS OF YOUR SPINE.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "HERE IT WILL BEGIN."
links.text: HERE IT WILL BEGIN.

links.title: You: "Where did the church go?"
links.text: Where did the church go?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: ""WHO FUCKING CARES?!""
links.text: "WHO FUCKING CARES?!"

links.title: You: "Good."
links.text: Good.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "No. NOT GOOD."
links.text: No. NOT GOOD.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "ORGASMIC!!!"
links.text: ORGASMIC!!!

links.title: You: "I'm scared."
links.text: I'm scared.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "GOOD. YOU SHOULD BE."
links.text: GOOD. YOU SHOULD BE.

links.title: You: "I hate waking life. I hate this wor..."
links.text: I hate waking life. I hate this world. I hate and fear everything. All I want is to dance... Please god, just let me dance!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "GOD?"
links.text: GOD?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "WHERE IS YOUR GOD?"
links.text: WHERE IS YOUR GOD?

links.title: You: "Where did the music go?"
links.text: Where did the music go?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Oh, don't worry, *the music* is sti..."
links.text: Oh, don't worry, *the music* is still there. It's *you* who's gone.

links.title: You: "No really, why can't I hear anythin..."
links.text: No really, why can't I hear anything?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "This is a pivotal moment. Try not t..."
links.text: This is a pivotal moment. Try not to piss yourself.

links.title: You: "Concentrate on hearing."
links.text: Concentrate on hearing.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Nothing. Just the immaculate silenc..."
links.text: Nothing. Just the immaculate silence of your spinal fluid. Electrified.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "It comes to you like a blue whale...."
links.text: It comes to you like a blue whale. You sense it stir the tranquillity of the deep -- a single note of bass passing through. Then it's gone. Back to *el silencio*.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "This is where the beat plunged. It..."
links.text: This is where the beat plunged. It will resurface soon. Brace for glory.

links.title: You: "What was that about *unformed skull..."
links.text: What was that about *unformed skulls*?

links.title: Spinal Cord: "Psst. I'm gonna let you in on a lit..."
links.text: Psst. I'm gonna let you in on a little secret. Every vertebrae in your spine is an unformed skull ready to pop up and replace the old one. Like shark teeth. The one you're currently in has a little brain forming in it. Waiting for its turn...

links.title: Spinal Cord: "...to rule the world."
links.text: ...to rule the world.

links.title: You: "Oh my god, is that true?"
links.text: Oh my god, is that true?

links.title: Spinal Cord: "Yes. It's all true -- in the *SPINA..."
links.text: Yes. It's all true -- in the *SPINAL CORD*.

links.title: You: "What do you want?"
links.text: What do you want?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "From what I can see, it's about to..."
links.text: From what I can see, it's about to BUST A MOVE.

links.title: You: "What is happening?"
links.text: What is happening?

links.title: You: "I'm ready."
links.text: I'm ready.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Good. Because from what I can see,..."
links.text: Good. Because from what I can see, it's about to BUST A MOVE.

links.title: You: "As it ought to be. Where is it?"
links.text: As it ought to be. Where is it?

links.title: Spinal Cord: "IN THE SPINAL CORD!"
links.text: IN THE SPINAL CORD!

links.title: You: "Who are you?"
links.text: Who are you?

links.title: Spinal Cord: "I am the spinal cord!"
links.text: I am the spinal cord!

links.title: You: "Bust a move."
links.text: Bust a move.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "Foolhardy! Do you even *know* what'..."
links.text: Foolhardy! Do you even *know* what's happening on the surface? Maybe a thousand years have passed? Or maybe you started spazzing out like two seconds ago?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "With your eyes still closed, the fi..."
links.text: With your eyes still closed, the first thing you feel, all the way back in the pivoting darkness of your own torso, is warmth. You have become a triumph of rhythmo-plastics -- somewhere in a smelly wooden church on the coast of Revachol. The wounds from the war you've waged on your body are healing, twist by twist, turn by turn.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You must have touched upon an entir..."
links.text: You must have touched upon an entirely new way of moving the human body! Every motion is pumping your brain full of endorphins... Open your eyes to the pioneering glory of HARD STYLE!

links.title: Conceptualization: "As you open your eyes, you should s..."
links.text: As you open your eyes, you should scream "HYPER! HYPER!" (It seems appropriate.)

links.title: You: ""HYPER! HYPER!""
links.text: "HYPER! HYPER!"

links.title: You: "Open your eyes and dance like you'v..."
links.text: Open your eyes and dance like you've never danced before.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You have become a flawless interloc..."
links.text: You have become a flawless interlocking mechanism. A flesh-and-bone approximation of the throb coming from the speaker set-up of the one called Egg Head's. Entirely, rigidly imbecilic. Without pity or fear.

links.title: Volition: "Free from self-awareness. No delibe..."
links.text: Free from self-awareness. No deliberation, only -- and I mean *only* -- execution.

links.title: Andre: ""Oh my god..." The speedfreaks' wou..."
links.text: "Oh my god..." The speedfreaks' would-be leader stands slack-jawed in disbelief at the hard-coreness on display. He whispers to himself: "No way..."

links.title: You: ""Yes way.""
links.text: "Yes way."

links.title: Egg Head: "With his reel-to-reel mixer blastin..."
links.text: With his reel-to-reel mixer blasting the anthem of a future that will never come, the young man observes your moves for a second...

links.title: Egg Head: "... then blasts into the same hideo..."
links.text: ... then blasts into the same hideous pattern, yelling: "AAAAAAHHHH!"

links.title: Noid: "He throws a screwdriver and a bunch..."
links.text: He throws a screwdriver and a bunch of drill chucks into the corner and explodes into dance. What he lacks in sharpness, he more than makes up for in violent enthusiasm.

links.title: You: ""Hard-Cop!""
links.text: "Hard-Cop!"

links.title: You: ""THIS IS REALLY HAPPENING.""
links.text: "THIS IS REALLY HAPPENING."

links.title: You: "Don't bust a move."
links.text: Don't bust a move.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "No one cares. The move will bust it..."
links.text: No one cares. The move will bust itself. Resistance only makes the move more futuristic.

dialogueTree.title: Savoir Faire: "You close your eyes and dream of th..."
dialogueTree.text: You close your eyes and dream of the shapes your body should form to bring this strange music into life. For now, such ferocity of motion is beyond you...

links.title: Limbic System: "...but just *imagine* the moves you..."
links.text: ...but just *imagine* the moves you could pull to this futuristic beat!

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Your aching leg doesn't want you to..."
links.text: Your aching leg doesn't want you to imagine *anything*, however. It just wants to lie down and rest.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hope you're not trying to dance..."
links.text: "I hope you're not trying to dance with that leg of yours," the lieutenant says, worried. "Healing from a gunshot wound takes time and patience. Be careful."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Puts a grin on your face just to th..."
links.text: Puts a grin on your face just to think about it. Even a failed attempt gets the juices flowing and repairs some of the damage done by battles lost. If you up the dose and TRULY DANCE, who knows what will happen?

links.title: Inland Empire: "SALVATION!"
links.text: SALVATION!

dialogueTree.title: Logic: "A number of things don't add up. Le..."
dialogueTree.text: A number of things don't add up. Let's take a look!

links.title: Drama: "How about: "Gather around, kids!""
links.text: How about: "Gather around, kids!"

links.title: You: ""Okay kids, now gather around...""
links.text: "Okay kids, now gather around..."

links.title: Noid: "The young speedfreak puts down a bu..."
links.text: The young speedfreak puts down a busted capacitor and looks at you.

links.title: Egg Head: "The one with the large head seems v..."
links.text: The one with the large head seems very enthusiastic about whatever you have planned.

links.title: Andre: "Their would-be leader is less amuse..."
links.text: Their would-be leader is less amused.

links.title: You: ""Some time in the past -- I'm not s..."
links.text: "Some time in the past -- I'm not sure where and how -- I fell sick and became the shadow you see now. But before that, I have reason to believe I was a police detective."

links.title: Andre: ""But you still are...""
links.text: "But you still are..."

links.title: You: ""Thank you for your kind words, but..."
links.text: "Thank you for your kind words, but everyone in here sees I'm a disgrace to the uniform."

links.title: Egg Head: ""What happened?" Egg Head looks ser..."
links.text: "What happened?" Egg Head looks serious, suddenly.

links.title: You: ""Disco happened.""
links.text: "Disco happened."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I've been trying to say we need th..."
links.text: "I've been trying to say we need the next step in dance music to happen *fast*..."

links.title: Andre: "He looks at his friend: "Shut it.""
links.text: He looks at his friend: "Shut it."

links.title: Egg Head: ""What? I *have*... I've said that!""
links.text: "What? I *have*... I've said that!"

links.title: You: ""It smelled so impossibly sweet...""
links.text: "It smelled so impossibly sweet..."

links.title: Egg Head: "He doesn't know what to say."
links.text: He doesn't know what to say.

links.title: You: ""Now, obviously, that might as well..."
links.text: "Now, obviously, that might as well have been a *thousand* years ago. But there's still some detective left in me."

links.title: Andre: "The young speedfreak is silent."
links.text: The young speedfreak is silent.

links.title: Empathy: "He senses something is wrong."
links.text: He senses something is wrong.

links.title: You: ""Life tore me a new asshole.""
links.text: "Life tore me a new asshole."

links.title: Egg Head: ""That's a real downer," he shakes h..."
links.text: "That's a real downer," he shakes his large head.

links.title: You: ""I did. *I* happened to myself.""
links.text: "I did. *I* happened to myself."

links.title: You: ""I don't know.""
links.text: "I don't know."

links.title: You: ""I was good enough in this job to b..."
links.text: "I was good enough in this job to be awarded the rank of lieutenant-yefreitor. I could have been captain. Imagine that?"

links.title: You: ""I was even entrusted with a firear..."
links.text: "I was even entrusted with a firearm, believe it or not." (Tap on your holster.) "A real firelance..."

links.title: Andre: "Silence. He watches your hand anxio..."
links.text: Silence. He watches your hand anxiously.

links.title: You: ""I got bad news for you, Andre. Thi..."
links.text: "I got bad news for you, Andre. Things don't add up."

links.title: Andre: ""What things?""
links.text: "What things?"

links.title: Empathy: "He senses something is wrong."
links.text: He senses something is wrong.

links.title: You: ""Soona hinted that there's somethin..."
links.text: "Soona hinted that there's something else going on. That I'm being *naive*."

links.title: Andre: ""Hey man, who knows what she's on a..."
links.text: "Hey man, who knows what she's on about." He scoffs. "I get it, she doesn't want us in the church. She's got something against us."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Who doesn't like to dance? *She* d..."
links.text: "Who doesn't like to dance? *She* doesn't like to dance!"

links.title: You: ""Soona said you've been lying about..."
links.text: "Soona said you've been lying about your plans. Your answer was very unconvincing."

links.title: Andre: "He furrows his brow. "Fuck, man, it..."
links.text: He furrows his brow. "Fuck, man, it's difficult to get along with some people, but we're trying to make an effort. We are on a *mission* here."

links.title: You: ""You're sober. Was it hard for you..."
links.text: "You're sober. Was it hard for you to keep sober for this meeting?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""We don't need drugs to be hard cor..."
links.text: "We don't need drugs to be hard core!"

links.title: Andre: ""Shut the fuck up, Egg!""
links.text: "Shut the fuck up, Egg!"

links.title: You: ""Maybe not today, Egg, but you need..."
links.text: "Maybe not today, Egg, but you need drugs to get through the days when you're not expecting me."

links.title: Noid: ""Climb down from the equestrian mon..."
links.text: "Climb down from the equestrian monument, cop-man. Consciousness is new to the universe. We all have our ways to ease the shock."

links.title: You: ""I know I wouldn't be as hard core..."
links.text: "I know I wouldn't be as hard core without drugs."

links.title: Andre: ""Uhm..." He doesn't knows how to co..."
links.text: "Uhm..." He doesn't knows how to comment on what you just said.

links.title: You: ""So, does Acele need drugs more tha..."
links.text: "So, does Acele need drugs more than you?"

links.title: Andre: ""We know she has a problem, man. We..."
links.text: "We know she has a problem, man. We're working on it. She didn't exactly have a smooth adolescence."

links.title: Empathy: "Underneath, he is furious she ruine..."
links.text: Underneath, he is furious she ruined it for them. This means trouble for their female friend.

links.title: You: ""Bottom line is: I know." (Proceed...."
links.text: "Bottom line is: I know." (Proceed.)

links.title: Andre: ""What exactly is it you know?" He s..."
links.text: "What exactly is it you know?" He sounds confrontational.

links.title: You: ""This isn't the makings of a club,..."
links.text: "This isn't the makings of a club, it's a tent full of laboratory equipment. For manufacturing drugs."

links.title: Andre: ""I have no idea how you arrived at..."
links.text: "I have no idea how you arrived at that conclusion, but it's *wrong!* Look, we even have speakers!" He points at the speaker.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "One speaker. They have *one* speake..."
links.text: One speaker. They have *one* speaker.

links.title: You: ""Where is his friend? Did he lose h..."
links.text: "Where is his friend? Did he lose his friend?"

links.title: Andre: ""What do you mean *friend*?""
links.text: "What do you mean *friend*?"

links.title: You: ""The other speaker. You have only o..."
links.text: "The other speaker. You have only one."

links.title: Andre: ""It's a one-speaker system! It's mo..."
links.text: "It's a one-speaker system! It's monodynamic. You wouldn't know the first thing about sound reproduction in anodic music! Other speaker... Pffft!"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "This may be the brain damage talkin..."
links.text: This may be the brain damage talking, but you've definitely never heard of  *monodynamic* or *one-speaker systems*.

links.title: You: ""You have no headphones. Wouldn't A..."
links.text: "You have no headphones. Wouldn't Acele need her headphones to *spin tape*?"

links.title: Andre: ""What do you know about spinning ta..."
links.text: "What do you know about spinning tape? Nothing!"

links.title: You: ""I know you pawned them. Likely for..."
links.text: "I know you pawned them. Likely for lab equipment and drug ingredients."

links.title: Andre: ""I'm sorry, but there is no lab equ..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, but there is no lab equipment. And no drug ingredients."

links.title: You: ""That Nosaphed is here for its acti..."
links.text: "That Nosaphed is here for its active ingredient."

links.title: Noid: ""He said it was for his nose. What..."
links.text: "He said it was for his nose. What more do you want?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Likely pseudoephedrine, almost exac..."
links.text: Likely pseudoephedrine, almost exactly the shape of ephedrine. Ephedrine makes you happy and so does pseudoephedrine.

links.title: You: ""The distilled water -- cornerstone..."
links.text: "The distilled water -- cornerstone of a clean lab."

links.title: Noid: ""And of all cellular-based life. Wh..."
links.text: "And of all cellular-based life. What's your point, law-bringer?"

links.title: You: ""The ether in the air -- a useful s..."
links.text: "The ether in the air -- a useful solvent. Good for getting acting agent out of a solution."

links.title: Andre: ""Make up your mind, first it's the..."
links.text: "Make up your mind, first it's the sweat, then it's the ether..." He smiles nervously.

links.title: You: ""There is no need for me to pile on..."
links.text: "There is no need for me to pile on any more, is there?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Andre: ""No shit..." He sounds tired."
links.text: "No shit..." He sounds tired.

links.title: You: ""In short: you tried to use a polic..."
links.text: "In short: you tried to use a police detective to set up a drug lab."

links.title: Andre: ""That's..." He waves his hands. "C'..."
links.text: "That's..." He waves his hands. "C'mon, that's..."

links.title: You: ""Preposterous?""
links.text: "Preposterous?"

links.title: Andre: ""I meant to say: Not true.""
links.text: "I meant to say: Not true."

links.title: You: ""Against the law?""
links.text: "Against the law?"

links.title: Andre: ""I meant to say: Not true.""
links.text: "I meant to say: Not true."

links.title: You: ""Punishable by summary execution?""
links.text: "Punishable by summary execution?"

links.title: Andre: ""It's not!" He looks at your hand n..."
links.text: "It's not!" He looks at your hand near your holster. His eyes fill with fear.

links.title: Inland Empire: "So *this* is what power feels like...."
links.text: So *this* is what power feels like. Do you like it?

links.title: You: "(I like it -- move hand closer to h..."
links.text: (I like it -- move hand closer to holster.) "So it's *not* punishable by death?"

links.title: Andre: ""No! It's not *true* is what I mean..."
links.text: "No! It's not *true* is what I meant!"

links.title: You: "(I can do without it. Put your hand..."
links.text: (I can do without it. Put your hand down.) "So it's *not* punishable by death?"

links.title: You: ""So turning a police officer into a..."
links.text: "So turning a police officer into an unwitting accomplice in a crime is *not* punishable by death?"

links.title: You: ""So lying to a police officer is *n..."
links.text: "So lying to a police officer is *not* punishable by death?"

links.title: Andre: ""It's not!" His eyes are wide with..."
links.text: "It's not!" His eyes are wide with fear.

links.title: You: ""So what are we going to do with yo..."
links.text: "So what are we going to do with you?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Andre: ""What do you mean 'do'?""
links.text: "What do you mean 'do'?"

links.title: Empathy: "There's resignation in his voice. H..."
links.text: There's resignation in his voice. He's almost ready to drop the act. It wouldn't take a lot of pushing.

links.title: Suggestion: "The optimal way to go about this wo..."
links.text: The optimal way to go about this would be indifference. It begins by you telling him you don't care about any of this.

links.title: Half Light: "Time for a threat. He can't handle..."
links.text: Time for a threat. He can't handle the pressure.

links.title: You: ""We do this law-man style. First yo..."
links.text: "We do this law-man style. First you tell me everything. Then I pass judgement."

links.title: Noid: ""Or else?" There is an audible clan..."
links.text: "Or else?" There is an audible clank as he lets a wrench drop into his toolbox.

links.title: You: ""Not blowing your brains out.""
links.text: "Not blowing your brains out."

links.title: Andre: ""Okay, man, okay...." You can see h..."
links.text: "Okay, man, okay...." You can see his hands shaking a little.

links.title: Andre: ""It was just impossible -- look at..."
links.text: "It was just impossible -- look at us! How are we going to pull a club out of our ass?! We need starter capital, that's all... We were *totally* going to turn the church into the wickedest club for anodic music in, like, ever..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""In the fucking world, man!""
links.text: "In the fucking world, man!"

links.title: Andre: ""Just like.... before we do we need..."
links.text: "Just like.... before we do we need to earn a bit of dough, do some real work! Get things going, you know."

links.title: Noid: ""Get our fucking foot in the door.""
links.text: "Get our fucking foot in the door."

links.title: Andre: ""Sell some fucking speed, okay? Pro..."
links.text: "Sell some fucking speed, okay? Produce and sell speed."

links.title: You: ""And then crabman and the programme..."
links.text: "And then crabman and the programmer lady moved in while you were gathering your shit."

links.title: Andre: ""Exactly! It was going fine -- a mo..."
links.text: "Exactly! It was going fine -- a month ago the place was empty, then suddenly it's all spooked up."

links.title: You: ""I've heard enough.""
links.text: "I've heard enough."

links.title: You: ""So, what happened?""
links.text: "So, what happened?"

links.title: You: ""I've heard enough.""
links.text: "I've heard enough."

links.title: You: ""Not calling back-up and hauling yo..."
links.text: "Not calling back-up and hauling you all off to the pen -- for starters."

links.title: Andre: ""Okay, man, okay." He raises his ha..."
links.text: "Okay, man, okay." He raises his hands.

links.title: Andre: ""Things are just so, so hard for an..."
links.text: "Things are just so, so hard for an entrepreneur in this city right now! It's not like we lied when we said we wanna turn the church into the wickedest club in East Revachol..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Because we do, we totally do!""
links.text: "Because we do, we totally do!"

links.title: Andre: ""We just... need to turn it into a..."
links.text: "We just... need to turn it into a speed lab before."

links.title: Noid: ""To get our foot in the door.""
links.text: "To get our foot in the door."

links.title: You: ""And why did you need me?""
links.text: "And why did you need me?"

links.title: Andre: ""Like I told you, spooky assholes m..."
links.text: "Like I told you, spooky assholes moved in while I was getting all this stuff together. A month ago the place was empty and now it's all spooked up."

links.title: You: ""They're not really *spooky*, are t..."
links.text: "They're not really *spooky*, are they?"

links.title: Andre: ""No, man! They're spooky alright. I..."
links.text: "No, man! They're spooky alright. It's just that they would also probably call the police if we started cooking speed in there."

links.title: Egg Head: ""But the sine was *way* off too. I..."
links.text: "But the sine was *way* off too. I couldn't feel the love at all..."

links.title: You: ""I've heard enough.""
links.text: "I've heard enough."

links.title: Andre: ""So... what now?""
links.text: "So... what now?"

links.title: Authority: "This is it. Judgement time!"
links.text: This is it. Judgement time!

links.title: You: ""Give me your cash." (Ask for a bri..."
links.text: "Give me your cash." (Ask for a bribe first.)

links.title: Andre: ""C'mon man..." He looks surprised...."
links.text: "C'mon man..." He looks surprised. "Really?"

links.title: Noid: "The young man doesn't move. His ear..."
links.text: The young man doesn't move. His earrings rattle from the tension. With his jaw clenched, he says:

links.title: Noid: ""No fucking way.""
links.text: "No fucking way."

links.title: Andre: ""Yes. Fucking. Way." The would-be l..."
links.text: "Yes. Fucking. Way." The would-be leader points at his friend. His finger shakes in the air.

links.title: Noid: "Without a word the other speedfreak..."
links.text: Without a word the other speedfreak pulls a red wallet out of the toolbox and hands it to you.

links.title: Empathy: "The disdain is palpable. His eyes p..."
links.text: The disdain is palpable. His eyes pierce you like lightning, as he lets go of the wallet.

links.title: Andre: ""Noid, give him the wallet.""
links.text: "Noid, give him the wallet."

links.title: You: ""Now give me the rest." (Ask for an..."
links.text: "Now give me the rest." (Ask for another bribe.)

links.title: Andre: ""We don't have any more money! You..."
links.text: "We don't have any more money! You robbed us blind."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Ask for a cut. It's the right time..."
links.text: Ask for a cut. It's the right time to become business partners.

links.title: You: ""Pack up and report to Precinct 41...."
links.text: "Pack up and report to Precinct 41." (Arrest them.)

links.title: Andre: "He looks beat. "Okay," he nods. "Wh..."
links.text: He looks beat. "Okay," he nods. "What happens at the station?"

links.title: You: ""The case will be reviewed. You mig..."
links.text: "The case will be reviewed. You might get prosecuted, or not. We'll see."

links.title: Andre: ""Fine... I guess we're truly done."..."
links.text: "Fine... I guess we're truly done." He sighs.

links.title: You: ""But first I need to see all of you..."
links.text: "But first I need to see all of your identification documents."

links.title: You: "(Ignore the question.) "First I nee..."
links.text: (Ignore the question.) "First I need to see all of your identification documents."

links.title: Andre: "The would-be leader pulls out a car..."
links.text: The would-be leader pulls out a card from his jacket pocket and hands it you. The name reads: 'Pete Andre.'

links.title: Noid: "His friend hands you his papers. Th..."
links.text: His friend hands you his papers. The name reads: 'Karl Holtzmann.'

links.title: You: ""And your name was Germaine?""
links.text: "And your name was Germaine?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Germaine." The one with the large..."
links.text: "Germaine." The one with the large head looks crushed handing you his paper. The name reads: "Germaine van der Wijk."

links.title: Egg Head: "Close to tears, the one with the la..."
links.text: Close to tears, the one with the large head hands you a card. The name reads: "Germaine van der Wijk."

links.title: You: "Mark their names down on your paper..."
links.text: Mark their names down on your paperwork and hand each their form.

links.title: Andre: ""I guess that's that.""
links.text: "I guess that's that."

links.title: Noid: ""Pack it up, Egg." He closes his to..."
links.text: "Pack it up, Egg." He closes his toolbox.

links.title: Egg Head: ""No, please!" The one with the larg..."
links.text: "No, please!" The one with the large head presses STOP on the tape player. In the silence, you can hear the wind howl outside.

links.title: Egg Head: ""There *needs* to be a club for ano..."
links.text: "There *needs* to be a club for anodic music in there. Everyone hates each other. Everybody hates it here, it's all just drugs and we're slaves and I *can't*... We are running out of time!" Without his smile he looks heartbroken. And older than you thought he was.

links.title: Inland Empire: "He looks almost as old as you."
links.text: He looks almost as old as you.

links.title: Egg Head: ""We need a win. I promise this will..."
links.text: "We need a win. I promise this will be a win! We won't cook speed in there, we'll do it clean, we'll do it true. We'll do it sober and *real* and beautiful. This will be a victory for the light."

links.title: Shivers: "This will be nothing."
links.text: This will be nothing.

links.title: Shivers: "You can hear the ice cracking under..."
links.text: You can hear the ice cracking underneath you. Outside on the pier the last century development crumbles in the wind, a grapeshot row of falling houses. And so does Rue Saint-Gérôme and Main Street. The Old Cinema is sinking underneath Villalobos...

links.title: You: ""Wait, does anyone feel that?""
links.text: "Wait, does anyone feel that?"

links.title: Andre: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: ""The law is the law. If you avoid t..."
links.text: "The law is the law. If you avoid the Call we will consider you fugitives and hunt you down." (Arrest them.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""No..." He looks like he's at least..."
links.text: "No..." He looks like he's at least 45 years old. "What does that even mean?"

links.title: You: ""It wouldn't change a thing. It's t..."
links.text: "It wouldn't change a thing. It's too late. For everything. You're arrested." (Arrest them.)

links.title: You: ""Man, that speech was beautiful. I..."
links.text: "Man, that speech was beautiful. I think I've changed my mind." (Don't arrest them.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Thank you...""
links.text: "Thank you..."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The young man gulps like he's tryin..."
links.text: The young man gulps like he's trying not to cry.

links.title: You: ""Get lost, I don't want to see you..."
links.text: "Get lost, I don't want to see you again." (Evict them.)

links.title: Andre: "The would-be leader looks beat. "Ok..."
links.text: The would-be leader looks beat. "Okay," he nods.

links.title: Noid: ""Pack it up, Egg." The young man cl..."
links.text: "Pack it up, Egg." The young man closes his toolbox.

links.title: You: ""You should be glad. I'm not even a..."
links.text: "You should be glad. I'm not even arresting you."

links.title: Andre: "He doesn't even look at you."
links.text: He doesn't even look at you.

links.title: You: ""You're getting off easy. I'm letti..."
links.text: "You're getting off easy. I'm letting you live."

links.title: Andre: "He glares at you. "Yes. *Thank you*..."
links.text: He glares at you. "Yes. *Thank you*, officer."

links.title: Egg Head: ""No, please!" Egg Head presses STOP..."
links.text: "No, please!" Egg Head presses STOP on the tape player. In the silence, you can hear the wind howl outside.

links.title: Egg Head: ""There *needs* to be a club for ano..."
links.text: "There *needs* to be a club for anodic music in there. Everyone hates each other. Everybody hates it here, it's all just drugs and we're slaves and I *can't*... We are running out of time!" Without his smile Egg Head looks heartbroken. And older than you thought he was.

links.title: Inland Empire: "He looks almost as old as you."
links.text: He looks almost as old as you.

links.title: Egg Head: ""We need a win. I promise this will..."
links.text: "We need a win. I promise this will be a win! We won't cook speed in there, we'll do it clean, we'll do it true. We'll do it sober and *real* and beautiful. This will be a victory for the light."

links.title: Shivers: "This will be nothing."
links.text: This will be nothing.

links.title: Shivers: "You can hear the ice cracking under..."
links.text: You can hear the ice cracking underneath you. Outside on the pier the last century development crumbles in the wind, a grapeshot row of falling houses. And so does Rue Saint-Gérôme and Main Street. The Old Cinema is sinking underneath Villalobos...

links.title: You: ""Wait, does anyone feel that?""
links.text: "Wait, does anyone feel that?"

links.title: Andre: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: ""No debate. Get lost, I'm not letti..."
links.text: "No debate. Get lost, I'm not letting some druggies take over a church." (Evict them.)

links.title: You: ""It wouldn't change a thing. It's t..."
links.text: "It wouldn't change a thing. It's too late. For everything. Just pack your bags and go." (Evict them.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""No..." He looks like he's at least..."
links.text: "No..." He looks like he's at least 45 years old. "What does that even mean?"

links.title: You: ""Man, that speech was beautiful. I..."
links.text: "Man, that speech was beautiful. I think I've changed my mind." (Don't evict them.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Thank you...""
links.text: "Thank you..."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The young man gulps like he's tryin..."
links.text: The young man gulps like he's trying not to cry.

links.title: You: ""Let's do this clean. No speed lab,..."
links.text: "Let's do this clean. No speed lab, just a club for anodic music." (Proceed with the club.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAHH!" The young man's smile wide..."
links.text: "YEAHH!" The young man's smile widens to inhuman proportions. His teeth beam in the floodlight.

links.title: Conceptualization: "He looks almost innocentic, with th..."
links.text: He looks almost innocentic, with that Harmon-Wowshi player raised up high. Could this be the certainty a spirit-of-the-world feels?

links.title: Andre: ""I knew it..." The would-be leader..."
links.text: "I knew it..." The would-be leader drops his spiked head between his knees...

links.title: Andre: ""It's impossible now.""
links.text: "It's impossible now."

links.title: Egg Head: ""No, Andre, it's *harder* now. This..."
links.text: "No, Andre, it's *harder* now. This Hard Cop has come to show us how much the fish is and the fish is always *so much* more... We all know there was never going to be a club for anodic music with the speed lab. Now it has a fighting chance!"

links.title: You: ""What's that about a fish?""
links.text: "What's that about a fish?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""There *needs* to be a club for ano..."
links.text: "There *needs* to be a club for anodic music in there. NEEDS TO! So we won't cook speed in there, we'll do it clean, we'll do it true. We'll do it sober and *real* and beautiful."

links.title: You: ""Right. Let's call this incident cr..."
links.text: "Right. Let's call this incident crime prevention, but I have my eye on you."

links.title: Andre: ""Okay, we'll try to do it without t..."
links.text: "Okay, we'll try to do it without the drugs." He raises his head from between his knees.

links.title: Andre: ""We'll do a straight up club in the..."
links.text: "We'll do a straight up club in there, spinning the maddest reels and nothing but, I swear to god! Okay, Egg?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""From here on it'll be straight all..."
links.text: "From here on it'll be straight all the way!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""There *needs* to be a club for ano..."
links.text: "There *needs* to be a club for anodic music in there. NEEDS TO! Everyone hates each other. Everybody hates it here, it's all just drugs and we're slaves and I *can't... we are running out of time!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""We need a win, Andre." He looks at..."
links.text: "We need a win, Andre." He looks at you. "I promise this will be a win! We won't cook speed in there, we'll do it clean, we'll do it true. We'll do it sober and *real* and beautiful. This will be a victory for the light!"

links.title: Shivers: "This will be nothing."
links.text: This will be nothing.

links.title: Shivers: "You can hear the ice crack undernea..."
links.text: You can hear the ice crack underneath you. Outside the last century waterfront development is crumbling in the wind, a grapeshot row of falling houses. And so is Rue Saint-Gérôme and all the houses on Main Row. The Old Cinema is sinking underneath Villalobos...

links.title: You: ""Wait, does anyone feel that?""
links.text: "Wait, does anyone feel that?"

links.title: Andre: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing...  Let's call this incide..."
links.text: "Nothing...  Let's call this incident crime prevention. But I have my eye on you."

links.title: You: ""So there was never going to be a c..."
links.text: "So there was never going to be a club in there?"

links.title: You: ""It wouldn't work without the lab...."
links.text: "It wouldn't work without the lab. Do what you have to do to keep the club alive." (Proceed with both.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAHH!" The young man's smile wide..."
links.text: "YEAHH!" The young man's smile widens to inhuman proportions. His teeth beam in the floodlight.

links.title: Conceptualization: "He looks almost innocentic, with th..."
links.text: He looks almost innocentic, with that Harmon-Wowshi player raised up high. Could this be the certainty a spirit-of-the-world feels?

links.title: Noid: ""Respectable. I'm really feeling th..."
links.text: "Respectable. I'm really feeling the sines right about now."

links.title: You: ""I'll go talk to Soona again, maybe..."
links.text: "I'll go talk to Soona again, maybe there's a way to persuade her."

links.title: Andre: ""I'm sure you'll figure something o..."
links.text: "I'm sure you'll figure something out. We can manage it with her if we get inside..."

links.title: Andre: ""Keep us updated about the situatio..."
links.text: "Keep us updated about the situation." He thrusts his toothbrush towards you. "Maybe we can help somehow."

links.title: You: ""It's probably not going to be easy..."
links.text: "It's probably not going to be easy, the spookers in the church are *not* going to be happy about this."

links.title: Andre: ""But you can just evict them, right..."
links.text: "But you can just evict them, right? You're the law, man. You've got this." He seems to be getting jittery with excitement.

links.title: You: ""It'll be tough, but we'll figure i..."
links.text: "It'll be tough, but we'll figure it out."

links.title: Andre: ""I knew from the get go we could co..."
links.text: "I knew from the get go we could count on you." He looks at his friends. "We can make this work -- the dance club will have a future!"

links.title: You: ""Keep the lab, but I want a cut of..."
links.text: "Keep the lab, but I want a cut of your operation." (Proceed with both, become a partner.)

links.title: Andre: ""Okay. That's cool with us, right?"..."
links.text: "Okay. That's cool with us, right?" He looks around.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeah!" His friend nods his huge pe..."
links.text: "Yeah!" His friend nods his huge peroxide blond head.

links.title: Noid: ""Ten percent.""
links.text: "Ten percent."

links.title: Andre: ""Don't be offensive, Noid. We could..."
links.text: "Don't be offensive, Noid. We could use a partner on the other side. It's safer with someone watching over the operation, keeping the... khm..." he clears his throat, "other cops out of our soup. How does 35% sound?"

links.title: Authority: "You have more control than they do,..."
links.text: You have more control than they do, the agreement should reflect that. You should push for 60%.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You could probably justify taking 7..."
links.text: You could probably justify taking 70%. The risks are greater for you as a police officer.

links.title: You: ""Deal.""
links.text: "Deal."

links.title: Andre: ""You deliver us the church and keep..."
links.text: "You deliver us the church and keep the law away from it and we'll give you your share, alright? Be sure to return every couple of months for your pay."

links.title: You: ""Hang on, I thought I'd get some mo..."
links.text: "Hang on, I thought I'd get some money quickly?"

links.title: Andre: ""Come now, it'll take weeks to get..."
links.text: "Come now, it'll take weeks to get everything set up, start making the produce, and deliver it around to the needy. This is a lengthy process."

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Andre: ""Okay. We're all cool now, right?"..."
links.text: "Okay. We're all cool now, right?" He sounds hopeful. "What's the next step? What's gonna happen now?"

links.title: You: ""Why should I profit so handsomely?..."
links.text: "Why should I profit so handsomely? I don't own the means of production, I don't wear the top hat. 25% is enough, towarzysz."

links.title: Noid: ""That's fair of you." The young man..."
links.text: "That's fair of you." The young man nods, approvingly. "Towarzysz hard core."

links.title: You: ""No. 50%. We do this even or not at..."
links.text: "No. 50%. We do this even or not at all."

links.title: Andre: ""Okay?" He looks around. There are..."
links.text: "Okay?" He looks around. There are no objections. "I want you to know there's no bad blood here."

links.title: You: ""55%. I want the control stock in t..."
links.text: "55%. I want the control stock in this or I simply won't be motivated." (Shrug.)

links.title: Andre: ""C'mon man, you're killing us..." A..."
links.text: "C'mon man, you're killing us..." Andre runs his hands through the spikes of his hair.

links.title: You: ""60%. I hold all the cards here, ki..."
links.text: "60%. I hold all the cards here, kids. I can lock you up and say this was all an act."

links.title: Andre: ""C'mon man, you're killing us..." A..."
links.text: "C'mon man, you're killing us..." Andre runs his hands through the spikes of his hair.

links.title: You: ""70%. I'm a police officer. I could..."
links.text: "70%. I'm a police officer. I could be risking thirty years of service for this. Actually -- I should take 75%."

links.title: Andre: ""C'mon man, you're killing us..." A..."
links.text: "C'mon man, you're killing us..." Andre runs his hands through the spikes of his hair.

links.title: You: ""70%. Nothing below that.""
links.text: "70%. Nothing below that."

links.title: You: ""It's 75% or I'm taking you to the..."
links.text: "It's 75% or I'm taking you to the holding pen right now."

links.title: Noid: ""Fuck this. Take us in or kill us...."
links.text: "Fuck this. Take us in or kill us. We're not bowing any longer."

links.title: Andre: "He looks to his friend, then at you..."
links.text: He looks to his friend, then at you. "Sorry," he nods. "I'm with Noid on this. Take us in or do it for 50%."

links.title: Volition: "Tough stuff. They're not kidding."
links.text: Tough stuff. They're not kidding.

links.title: You: ""50% it is." (Agree with the deal.)"
links.text: "50% it is." (Agree with the deal.)

links.title: You: ""I have to look into the spooker si..."
links.text: "I have to look into the spooker situation before I can decide what to do with you." (Decide later.)

links.title: Andre: ""We can continue on an amiable path..."
links.text: "We can continue on an amiable path, right? No more misunderstandings, no more lies." He nods, smiling cautiously. "Before you go, is there anything else you need?"

links.title: Noid: ""Other than squeezing every drop ou..."
links.text: "Other than squeezing every drop out of us."

links.title: Andre: ""Hush, Noid.""
links.text: "Hush, Noid."

links.title: Noid: ""Other than all our money.""
links.text: "Other than all our money."

links.title: You: ""I have to check out the church bef..."
links.text: "I have to check out the church before I can decide what to do with you." (Decide later.)

links.title: Andre: ""I understand, detective. I hope we..."
links.text: "I understand, detective. I hope we can continue on an amiable path, right? No more misunderstandings, no more lies." He smiles cautiously. "Before you go, is there anything else you need?"

links.title: You: ""Haven't you heard? I'm the dirties..."
links.text: "Haven't you heard? I'm the dirtiest cop this side of the river. I'll make life *hard* for you, using every connection I've got."

links.title: Andre: "He thinks for a moment, then opens..."
links.text: He thinks for a moment, then opens his mouth, but closes it again. Then finally raises his hands:

links.title: Andre: ""Things are just way too hard for a..."
links.text: "Things are just way too hard for an entrepreneur in this city. It's not like we're *not* gonna turn the church into the wickedest club in East Revachol..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Because we are! We totally are!""
links.text: "Because we are! We totally are!"

links.title: Andre: ""We just gotta turn it into a speed..."
links.text: "We just gotta turn it into a speed lab *first*."

links.title: Noid: ""You know, to get our foot in the d..."
links.text: "You know, to get our foot in the door."

links.title: You: ""We'll see. Now speak.""
links.text: "We'll see. Now speak."

links.title: You: "(Time for heavy leverage. Pull out..."
links.text: (Time for heavy leverage. Pull out your gun.) "Summary execution."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Your hand moves, smooth and lightni..."
links.text: Your hand moves, smooth and lightning-fast, to the holster -- you whip out the gun.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "As if you've done it before."
links.text: As if you've done it before.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The 9mm Villiers feels surprisingly..."
links.text: The 9mm Villiers feels surprisingly light in your hand. Almost toy-like. You imagine death, sorrow and the dramatic re-imagining of Andre's face burst out of its muzzle, and it feels almost preposterous...

links.title: Andre: ""WAIT!!!""
links.text: "WAIT!!!"

links.title: You: "(Point gun at Andre.) "Yes? I'm lis..."
links.text: (Point gun at Andre.) "Yes? I'm listening."

links.title: Andre: ""You can't just... you can't..." He..."
links.text: "You can't just... you can't..." He's mumbling half-incoherently. "We haven't..." Suddenly, he gets interrupted by a voice:

links.title: Egg Head: ""This is so fucked up..." Egg Head..."
links.text: "This is so fucked up..." Egg Head mumbles, looking for the *stop* button on the tape player. For a moment you can hear the wind howl outside.

links.title: Egg Head: ""This is NOT happening. Officer, pl..."
links.text: "This is NOT happening. Officer, please..." Without his smile Egg Head looks heartbroken and older than you thought.

links.title: Inland Empire: "He looks almost as old as you."
links.text: He looks almost as old as you.

links.title: Egg Head: ""There *needs* to be a club for ano..."
links.text: "There *needs* to be a club for anodic music in there. Everyone hates each other. Everyone hates it, it's all just drugs and we're slaves and I *can't...* We are running out of time."

links.title: Egg Head: ""We need a win." He looks at you wi..."
links.text: "We need a win." He looks at you with wide eyes. "I *promise* you this will be a win. We won't cook speed in there, we'll do it clean, we'll do it true, we'll do it sober and *real* and beautiful. This will be a victory for the light."

links.title: Shivers: "This will be nothing."
links.text: This will be nothing.

links.title: Shivers: "You can hear the ice cracking under..."
links.text: You can hear the ice cracking underneath you. Outside, the last century waterside development is crumbling in the wind, a grapeshot row of falling houses on the pier. And so is Rue Saint-Gérôme and Main Street. The Old Cinema is sinking underneath Villalobos...

links.title: Noid: "Noid surveys the situation with his..."
links.text: Noid surveys the situation with his face pale and blank. His eyebrow is twitching.

links.title: You: "(Holster the gun.) "There we go. A..."
links.text: (Holster the gun.) "There we go. A few threats will get things moving quickly. Time to talk."

links.title: Andre: ""Okay, man, okay..." He's shaking...."
links.text: "Okay, man, okay..." He's shaking. "Don't do anything rash! We didn't mean to fuck you over."

links.title: You: "(Lower the gun.) "All right. Speak...."
links.text: (Lower the gun.) "All right. Speak."

links.title: You: "(Admire the gun in your hand.) "Tel..."
links.text: (Admire the gun in your hand.) "Tell me, why should I do that?"

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You grab hold of the grip and pull..."
links.text: You grab hold of the grip and pull hard, but it won't budge. The gun is caught on the seam inside your jacket.

links.title: You: "Pull harder."
links.text: Pull harder.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Nope. It's stuck in there good."
links.text: Nope. It's stuck in there good.

links.title: Andre: ""Whoa-whoa, hold on! There's no nee..."
links.text: "Whoa-whoa, hold on! There's no need for this!" A bead of sweat runs down the side of Andre's head.

links.title: Noid: ""Law-man, be real careful and sensi..."
links.text: "Law-man, be real careful and sensible about what you're about to do." Noid is slowly shifting his hand toward a hammer.

links.title: You: ""Better keep those hands where they..."
links.text: "Better keep those hands where they are, Noid."

links.title: Andre: ""Noid!" Andre hisses. "No need to e..."
links.text: "Noid!" Andre hisses. "No need to escalate things. It's okay, let's all calm down."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "If they try something, just knock t..."
links.text: If they try something, just knock their teeth out!

links.title: Authority: "There's always your backup outside...."
links.text: There's always your backup outside... stay firm. You've got the upper hand.

links.title: You: ""I'm plenty calm. I think it's abou..."
links.text: "I'm plenty calm. I think it's about time you told me everything."

links.title: Egg Head: ""This is so fucked up...""
links.text: "This is so fucked up..."

links.title: Andre: ""It's okay, Egg. It's all okay..."..."
links.text: "It's okay, Egg. It's all okay..." He's still shaking from the tension.

links.title: You: ""Remember, I can still punch you in..."
links.text: "Remember, I can still punch you in the face."

links.title: Andre: ""I get it! Okay, man..." He's still..."
links.text: "I get it! Okay, man..." He's still shaking a bit...

links.title: You: ""My partner is still outside and he..."
links.text: "My partner is still outside and he's a no-nonsense guy."

links.title: Andre: ""Got it! There's no need to get any..."
links.text: "Got it! There's no need to get anyone else involved. "He wipes the sweat off his head. "Okay, man, listen..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant stands behind a whit..."
links.text: The lieutenant stands behind a white table, cleaning his gun. It would truly come in handy in a tense situation like this one.

links.title: You: "(Show both hands to the guys.) "Alr..."
links.text: (Show both hands to the guys.) "Alright, I'm not going to do anything harsh... yet."

links.title: Andre: ""It's all cool... we don't need to..."
links.text: "It's all cool... we don't need to escalate things. Let's all calm down."

links.title: You: "(Let go of gun.) "Man, how did I me..."
links.text: (Let go of gun.) "Man, how did I mess this up so bad."

links.title: Andre: ""You made your point, alright? We d..."
links.text: "You made your point, alright? We don't need to escalate things... let's just calm down."

links.title: You: "(Let go of gun.) "You better start..."
links.text: (Let go of gun.) "You better start talking right now."

links.title: You: ""God dammit, can't get..." (Keep tu..."
links.text: "God dammit, can't get..." (Keep tugging.) "...fucking gun... out!"

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You're only making things worse. Th..."
links.text: You're only making things worse. The jacket is going to rip if you continue.

links.title: You: ""Come on, don't do this to me, baby..."
links.text: "Come on, don't do this to me, baby, it's my time to be cool..."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Sorry, boiadeiro, the moment has pa..."
links.text: Sorry, boiadeiro, the moment has passed. You just won't look cool anymore.

links.title: You: ""You tell me what's really going on..."
links.text: "You tell me what's really going on and we'll work from there. I can be lenient."

links.title: Andre: ""What do you mean by *lenient*?""
links.text: "What do you mean by *lenient*?"

links.title: You: ""I don't really care, I just wanted..."
links.text: "I don't really care, I just wanted to crack the case. Do what you want and I'll do what I want."

links.title: Andre: ""*Really...?*" He sounds relieved."
links.text: "*Really...?*" He sounds relieved.

links.title: You: ""Of course not *really*. I'm a cop!..."
links.text: "Of course not *really*. I'm a cop! Now tell me what's going on, immediately!"

links.title: You: ""Really-really. I wanted to ask you..."
links.text: "Really-really. I wanted to ask you about something else."

links.title: Andre: ""You wanted to just ask me..." he's..."
links.text: "You wanted to just ask me..." he's a bit perplexed now. "About *something else*?"

links.title: You: "(Shrug.) "Or you can tell me the pl..."
links.text: (Shrug.) "Or you can tell me the plan for the church really was."

links.title: You: ""Yes, I did. I'm that kind of perso..."
links.text: "Yes, I did. I'm that kind of person. Now tell me..." (Move on to other questions.)

links.title: Andre: ""Okay!" He sounds very happy."
links.text: "Okay!" He sounds very happy.

dialogueTree.title: Logic: "Okay, so the speedfreaks want to st..."
dialogueTree.text: Okay, so the speedfreaks want to start a club for dance music. That much checks out. Youths like music. You feel as though you might have liked music more when you were young too... but you digress.

links.title: You: "Mmmhm. (Rub your chin.) What's the..."
links.text: Mmmhm. (Rub your chin.) What's the *gist* of it.

links.title: Logic: "The gist of it is: They want to tur..."
links.text: The gist of it is: They want to turn the church into a club, but a suspicious element has overtaken the building. It's very important to understand what the *gist* of things is -- always consult the gist before making up your mind. This is going well.

links.title: Logic: "Of course, not everything is 100% c..."
links.text: Of course, not everything is 100% clear here but when is it ever? Congratulations, kids. Your story *sort of* checks out.

links.title: Logic: "All in all, you really can't tell w..."
links.text: All in all, you really can't tell what that mean programmer grandma was talking about.

links.title: Volition: "It still feels as if this didn't *q..."
links.text: It still feels as if this didn't *quite* go as it should have, but...

links.title: You: "Mmmhm. And then there's the narcoma..."
links.text: Mmmhm. And then there's the narcomania.

dialogueTree.title: Logic: "Nothing jumps out to you. Nothing o..."
dialogueTree.text: Nothing jumps out to you. Nothing out of the ordinary.

links.title: You: "Hmm, but Soona said they haven't be..."
links.text: Hmm, but Soona said they haven't been honest with me...

links.title: Logic: "Haven't they? Or maybe it's that me..."
links.text: Haven't they? Or maybe it's that mean programmer herself who's been lying to you...

links.title: You: "Really? Because I could swear somet..."
links.text: Really? Because I could swear something's not adding up here.

links.title: Logic: "How about you get out and breathe -..."
links.text: How about you get out and breathe -- the air in the tent is too thick for you to think clearly.

links.title: You: "(Turn to Acele.) "What are you doin..."
links.text: (Turn to Acele.) "What are you doing?!"

links.title: Acele: "The young woman lifts her headphone..."
links.text: The young woman lifts her headphones up slightly and raises her chin, looking at you expectantly.

links.title: You: ""Dance! Aren't you going to *dance*..."
links.text: "Dance! Aren't you going to *dance*?!"

links.title: Acele: ""No. Recording." She stares at you,..."
links.text: "No. Recording." She stares at you, then briskly shakes her head and puts her headphones back on.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Acele, aren't you going to dance?""
links.text: "Acele, aren't you going to dance?"

links.title: Acele: ""No. Recording." She turns to Soona..."
links.text: "No. Recording." She turns to Soona, then back to you. She briskly shakes her head and puts her headphones back on.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: "The lead programmer throws the othe..."
links.text: The lead programmer throws the other young woman a knowing glance before turning her attention back to her own work.

links.title: Composure: "She's still at her mainframe, press..."
links.text: She's still at her mainframe, pressing buttons, reading printouts, but she's started nodding her head along to the music.

links.title: You: ""DANCE!" (Point at Andre.) "It's *T..."
links.text: "DANCE!" (Point at Andre.) "It's *The Law*."

links.title: Andre: "The young man immediately bounces u..."
links.text: The young man immediately bounces up and down, then assumes the same dance pattern, embellishing it with some sort of waving motion.

links.title: Authority: "The authority of The Law is clearly..."
links.text: The authority of The Law is clearly unquestionable.

links.title: You: ""Kim, get in here!" (Call for the l..."
links.text: "Kim, get in here!" (Call for the lieutenant to join you.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's going on here?" The lieuten..."
links.text: "What's going on here?" The lieutenant looks at you and the speedfreaks grinding around in the church, a group of unhinged lunatics. "Delinquents," he grumbles.

links.title: Drama: "This is clearly a Code 31 emergency..."
links.text: This is clearly a Code 31 emergency.

links.title: You: ""Code 31! Code 31!""
links.text: "Code 31! Code 31!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant squeezes the bridge..."
links.text: The lieutenant squeezes the bridge of his nose. The lights reflect off his glasses...

links.title: Empathy: "He's obviously having trouble adjus..."
links.text: He's obviously having trouble adjusting to this new reality.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A Code 31 emergency? Really?""
links.text: "A Code 31 emergency? Really?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, officer in need of assistance..."
links.text: "Yes, officer in need of assistance... ON THE DANCE FLOOR!"

links.title: You: ""It's not really an emergency, Kim!..."
links.text: "It's not really an emergency, Kim! I lied!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant crosses his arms wit..."
links.text: The lieutenant crosses his arms with a bemused look.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, Kim, I thought it would..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, Kim, I thought it would be funny to call a Code 31! I didn't even know it was a real code..."

links.title: You: ""I said, get in here and DANCE!""
links.text: "I said, get in here and DANCE!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant squeezes the bridge..."
links.text: The lieutenant squeezes the bridge of his nose. The lights reflect off his glasses, giving him the appearance of a surgeon in the middle of a tense procedure...

links.title: Empathy: "He's having trouble adjusting to th..."
links.text: He's having trouble adjusting to the new reality before him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""WHAT'S HAPPENING?!" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "WHAT'S HAPPENING?!" The lieutenant is forced to yell over the futuristic music blasting from the speakers. "HOW THE HELL ARE YOU DANCING WITH THAT BROKEN LEG OF YOURS?"

links.title: You: ""I'm under cover!""
links.text: "I'm under cover!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good for you!" He looks around the..."
links.text: "Good for you!" He looks around the church hall. "Rock on, then..."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Somehow you manage to hear him sigh..."
links.text: Somehow you manage to hear him sigh.

links.title: You: ""Hey! I called you to dance!""
links.text: "Hey! I called you to dance!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: ""I *did* say there was an emergency..."
links.text: "I *did* say there was an emergency on the dance floor, did I not? The emergency?! NOT ENOUGH KIM!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, c'mon...""
links.text: "Oh, c'mon..."

links.title: Suggestion: "Did that just cheer him up a bit? C..."
links.text: Did that just cheer him up a bit? Could be... It feels like the lieutenant cracked a little smile there.

links.title: You: ""Okay, okay..." (Leave him be.)"
links.text: "Okay, okay..." (Leave him be.)

links.title: You: "That's it! Don't let the lieutenant..."
links.text: That's it! Don't let the lieutenant leave without getting his hard core on!

links.title: Authority: "Who's the one in charge? You are!"
links.text: Who's the one in charge? You are!

links.title: You: "(Point to the floor.) "ON THE DANCE..."
links.text: (Point to the floor.) "ON THE DANCE FLOOR, NOW! Dance or face a disciplinary hearing!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you kidding me?!""
links.text: "Are you kidding me?!"

links.title: You: ""I assure you, I am *not*. Now get..."
links.text: "I assure you, I am *not*. Now get your groove on, lieutenant!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Get my *what* on?" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Get my *what* on?" The lieutenant leans closer, unable to make out your words over the pumping beats.

links.title: You: ""I said: Get your goddamn groove on..."
links.text: "I said: Get your goddamn groove on! BOOGIE-WOOGIE!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sheesh, okay..." He backs up with..."
links.text: "Sheesh, okay..." He backs up with his hands raised in the air, observing the criss-cross of your feet...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, you psychopath..." He adjust..."
links.text: "Okay, you psychopath..." He adjusts his spectacles, then pops his collar as high as it will go. "I see what you're doing there. It's jacked-up footwork, plus some... Is that Ubi folk dancing?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Nah, it's not *Ubi folk*, it's har..."
links.text: "Nah, it's not *Ubi folk*, it's hard core!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah..." The lieutenant snorts. "W..."
links.text: "Yeah..." The lieutenant snorts. "Whatever."

links.title: You: ""You talk a big talk, lieutenant! L..."
links.text: "You talk a big talk, lieutenant! Let's see some moves!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh yeah? I did 15 years in the Juv..."
links.text: "Oh yeah? I did 15 years in the Juvenile Crime Unit. I can *do* age-inappropriate."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now check *this* shit out!""
links.text: "Now check *this* shit out!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant begins to heel-kick..."
links.text: The lieutenant begins to heel-kick the church floor with such intensity, it's reasonable to fear he'll kick a hole right through it, causing the floor to crack and the pillars to collapse, bringing the church roof down on all of you.

links.title: Empathy: "It doesn't look like he'd *give a s..."
links.text: It doesn't look like he'd *give a shit* either.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Part of him is amazed you're both a..."
links.text: Part of him is amazed you're both able to just *dance* after all these horrifying events in Martinaise.

links.title: You: ""Hard core will never die -- but yo..."
links.text: "Hard core will never die -- but you will!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hard core, *shmard core*... I did..."
links.text: "Hard core, *shmard core*... I did 15 years in the Juvenile Crime Unit. I can *do* age-inappropriate."

links.title: You: "Say nothing, but push the footwork..."
links.text: Say nothing, but push the footwork extra hard.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That all you got? I did 15 years i..."
links.text: "That all you got? I did 15 years in the Juvenile Crime Unit. I can *do* age-inappropriate."

links.title: You: ""It's all a *joke* to you isn't it?..."
links.text: "It's all a *joke* to you isn't it?! Chain of command -- joke! Future of dance -- joke! Well, no more! Cut a rug, lieutenant!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?" The lieutenant leans closer..."
links.text: "What?" The lieutenant leans closer, unable to make out your words over the pumping beats. "Cut a *what*?"

links.title: You: ""I said: Cut a god damn rug, lieute..."
links.text: "I said: Cut a god damn rug, lieutenant! BOOGIE-WOOGIE!"

links.title: Authority: "What's harder core than a little bi..."
links.text: What's harder core than a little bit of...

links.title: You: ""Dance, monkey fucker!!""
links.text: "Dance, monkey fucker!!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me, *what*?""
links.text: "Excuse me, *what*?"

links.title: Volition: "No! Stop immediately. Stop dancing..."
links.text: No! Stop immediately. Stop dancing and apologize.

links.title: You: ""Dance, you yellow monkey fucker!""
links.text: "Dance, you yellow monkey fucker!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Dance? Yellow?" He pauses to look..."
links.text: "Dance? Yellow?" He pauses to look at you with tired eyes. "*Monkey fucker*?"

links.title: Empathy: "Yes, if anything, the lieutenant fe..."
links.text: Yes, if anything, the lieutenant feels tired. Like a man who's heard the same record one time too many.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're done.""
links.text: "We're done."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Then a breath of cold sea air fills..."
links.text: Then a breath of cold sea air fills the church as the lieutenant opens the door and steps out.

links.title: You: "(Stop.) "I don't know what got into..."
links.text: (Stop.) "I don't know what got into me. I'm so sorry. I just lost control for a moment."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Dance?" he repeats. "*Monkey* fuck..."
links.text: "Dance?" he repeats. "*Monkey* fucker?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Then a breath of cold sea air fills..."
links.text: Then a breath of cold sea air fills the church as the lieutenant opens the door and steps out.

links.title: You: "With *THE EXPRESSION* primed on you..."
links.text: With *THE EXPRESSION* primed on your face, dance toward the lieutenant.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks down, then at you."
links.text: He looks down, then at you.

links.title: You: ""Dance, you yellow monkey fucker!""
links.text: "Dance, you yellow monkey fucker!"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "This would be a good time to add so..."
links.text: This would be a good time to add some nerve damage to the mix. Pull *THE EXPRESSION* too!

links.title: You: ""Nothing. It was nothing." (Leave h..."
links.text: "Nothing. It was nothing." (Leave him be.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant taps his foot and lo..."
links.text: The lieutenant taps his foot and looks at his wristwatch. He doesn't seem pleased with this waste of time.

links.title: You: ""We ain't going anywhere before we..."
links.text: "We ain't going anywhere before we *tear shit up*!"

links.title: You: ""I have become Dance, the destroyer..."
links.text: "I have become Dance, the destroyer of worlds."

links.title: You: ""*I'm* not *doing* anything. The mu..."
links.text: "*I'm* not *doing* anything. The music made its mind up a long time ago -- I'm just *implementing*!"

links.title: You: ""Help, Kim, I think I'm turning int..."
links.text: "Help, Kim, I think I'm turning into some kind of hyper-star!"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry! I know this looks crazy..."
links.text: "I'm sorry! I know this looks crazy, but it feels too good to stop!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""WHAT'S HAPPENING?!" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "WHAT'S HAPPENING?!" The lieutenant is forced to yell over the futuristic music blasting from the speakers.

links.title: You: "(Say to yourself.) "On second thoug..."
links.text: (Say to yourself.) "On second thought, maybe I don't need to involve the lieutenant in this... pioneering dance-off."

links.title: Andre: ""You TOTALLY do!" Andre waves his h..."
links.text: "You TOTALLY do!" Andre waves his hands around his head, perhaps to imply that he's *out of his mind*...

links.title: You: "Is there anything more I can do? I..."
links.text: Is there anything more I can do? I want to break the limit.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The dynamic motion of your flailing..."
links.text: The dynamic motion of your flailing body is bordering on the extreme. You're going off the charts...

links.title: Inland Empire: "You feel as if turning on the hyper..."
links.text: You feel as if turning on the hyper-drive will be a point of no return. Feels almost melancholy... Are you sure you have the entire posse along for this?

links.title: You: ""Together! WHERE ARE YOU?!""
links.text: "Together! WHERE ARE YOU?!"

links.title: You: "No, wait..."
links.text: No, wait...

links.title: Composure: "No time to wait!"
links.text: No time to wait!

links.title: Noid: ""Here we go again!!!""
links.text: "Here we go again!!!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hard core fills the air!""
links.text: "Hard core fills the air!"

links.title: Andre: ""The sound above my hair!""
links.text: "The sound above my hair!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The what now?" The lieutenant sudd..."
links.text: "The what now?" The lieutenant suddenly stops. "The sound above your *what*?"

links.title: Andre: ""Above my hair, man!""
links.text: "Above my hair, man!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, this is too imbecilic. Excus..."
links.text: "Okay, this is too imbecilic. Excuse me."

links.title: You: "Turn on the hyper-drive!"
links.text: Turn on the hyper-drive!

links.title: Shivers: "On the coast of the Martinaise Inle..."
links.text: On the coast of the Martinaise Inlet, in a small weather-beaten stave church built 380 years ago by settlers from the Occident, most likely to guard against an anomaly at its centre, an officer of the RCM is contorting his body into idiotically rigid shapes, as he invents the future of dance music... It's the *hardest* anyone has ever danced.

links.title: You: "What's happening to me? What is thi..."
links.text: What's happening to me? What is this strange feeling that comes...

links.title: Shivers: "I AM LA REVACHOLIÈRE."
links.text: I AM LA REVACHOLIÈRE.

links.title: Shivers: "I AM THE CITY."
links.text: I AM THE CITY.

links.title: You: "What do you mean, *you are the city..."
links.text: What do you mean, *you are the city*?

links.title: Shivers: "I AM A FRAGMENT OF THE WORLD SPIRIT..."
links.text: I AM A FRAGMENT OF THE WORLD SPIRIT, THE GENIUS LOCI OF REVACHOL.

links.title: Shivers: "MY HEART IS THE WIND CORRIDOR. THE..."
links.text: MY HEART IS THE WIND CORRIDOR. THE BOTTOM OF MY AIR IS RED. I HAVE A HUNDRED THOUSAND LUMINOUS ARMS.

links.title: Shivers: "COME MORNING, I CARRY INDUSTRIAL DU..."
links.text: COME MORNING, I CARRY INDUSTRIAL DUST AND LET IT SETTLE ON TREE LEAVES. I SHAKE THE DUST FROM THOSE LEAVES AND ONTO YOUR COAT.

links.title: Shivers: "I'VE SEEN YOU, I'VE SEEN YOU! I'VE..."
links.text: I'VE SEEN YOU, I'VE SEEN YOU! I'VE SEEN YOU WITH HER -- AND I'VE SEEN YOU WITHOUT HER. I'VE SEEN YOU ON THE CRESCENT OF THE HILL.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "She's speaking fast because she is..."
links.text: She's speaking fast because she is afraid.

links.title: You: "What are you afraid of?"
links.text: What are you afraid of?

links.title: Shivers: "DEATH -- IT IS TERRIFYING. I NEED Y..."
links.text: DEATH -- IT IS TERRIFYING. I NEED YOU TO PROTECT ME FROM DEATH. I CANNOT PERISH. LOOK AT ME. I CANNOT END.

links.title: Shivers: "IN 22 YEARS, THE FIRST SHOT WILL BE..."
links.text: IN 22 YEARS, THE FIRST SHOT WILL BE FIRED. NOT A SHOT FROM A GUN -- AN ATOMIC DEVICE THAT WILL LEVEL ALL OF ME. ALL OF ME.

links.title: You: "I knew it. I knew the end of the wo..."
links.text: I knew it. I knew the end of the world was coming!

links.title: Shivers: "I CANNOT PERISH WITH IT, OFFICER OF..."
links.text: I CANNOT PERISH WITH IT, OFFICER OF THE CITIZENS MILITIA. YOU CANNOT LET ME.

links.title: Shivers: "I NEED YOU. YOU CAN KEEP ME ON THIS..."
links.text: I NEED YOU. YOU CAN KEEP ME ON THIS EARTH. BE VIGILANT. I LOVE YOU.

links.title: Shivers: "An officer of the RCM is lying on t..."
links.text: An officer of the RCM is lying on the floor of a small church with his eyes rolled back and his tongue lolling out. Several others are standing around him. He slowly comes to.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Had a good rest there?""
links.text: "Had a good rest there?"

links.title: You: ""I spoke to the City of Revachol!""
links.text: "I spoke to the City of Revachol!"

links.title: Noid: ""Fuck yeah!""
links.text: "Fuck yeah!"

links.title: Andre: ""I bet you did! Those were *some* a..."
links.text: "I bet you did! Those were *some* advanced moves, man."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's all great, but we should re..."
links.text: "That's all great, but we should really get going. We've spent enough time doing aerobic exercise for today."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's all great, but we should re..."
links.text: "That's all great, but we should really get going. We've spent enough time doing aerobic exercise for today."

links.title: You: ""That was great, but I'm all out of..."
links.text: "That was great, but I'm all out of juice now, guys. Besides, I should really talk to my partner." (Get up.)

links.title: You: ""That was great, but I'm all out of..."
links.text: "That was great, but I'm all out of juice now." (Get up.)

links.title: You: ""I don't know about good...""
links.text: "I don't know about good..."

links.title: Andre: ""Relax. People pass out while party..."
links.text: "Relax. People pass out while partying hard all the time. You're just dehydrated."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So..." He looks at you with mild c..."
links.text: "So..." He looks at you with mild concern. "We should get going maybe?"

links.title: You: "(Get up.)"
links.text: (Get up.)

links.title: Endurance: "*And* you've been recently shot in..."
links.text: *And* you've been recently shot in the leg.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Andre: ""Had a good rest there?""
links.text: "Had a good rest there?"

links.title: You: "But... what can I do about it?"
links.text: But... what can I do about it?

links.title: Shivers: "YOU ARE AN OFFICER OF THE CITIZENS..."
links.text: YOU ARE AN OFFICER OF THE CITIZENS MILITIA. YOU MOVE THROUGH MY STREETS FREELY IN MOTOR CARRIAGES AND ON FOOT. YOU HAVE ACCESS TO THE HIDDEN PLACES. YOU ALSO CIRCULATE AMONG THOSE WHO ARE HIDDEN.

links.title: You: "I won't live that long."
links.text: I won't live that long.

links.title: You: "But who am *I*? Why are you talking..."
links.text: But who am *I*? Why are you talking to me?

links.title: Shivers: "YOU ARE AN OFFICER OF THE CITIZENS..."
links.text: YOU ARE AN OFFICER OF THE CITIZENS MILITIA. *AGENTES IN REBUS*, WHEN YOU WEAR YOUR COAT, YOU WEAR MY SOUL.

links.title: Shivers: "YOU MOVE THROUGH MY STREETS FREELY..."
links.text: YOU MOVE THROUGH MY STREETS FREELY IN MOTOR CARRIAGES AND ON FOOT. YOU HAVE ACCESS TO THE HIDDEN PLACES. YOU ALSO CIRCULATE AMONG THOSE WHO ARE HIDDEN.

links.title: You: "My partner... I think I insulted hi..."
links.text: My partner... I think I insulted him just now, and I'm not sure that he'll forgive me.

links.title: Shivers: "YOU MUST MAKE IT RIGHT AT ONCE. UNI..."
links.text: YOU MUST MAKE IT RIGHT AT ONCE. UNITY IS PARAMOUNT. AND REMEMBER...

links.title: You: "Keep the thought to yourself."
links.text: Keep the thought to yourself.

links.title: Shivers: "BY THE WAY, APOLOGIZE TO YOUR PARTN..."
links.text: BY THE WAY, APOLOGIZE TO YOUR PARTNER AT ONCE. UNITY AMONG THE RANKS IS PARAMOUNT.

links.title: Rhetoric: "All this eloquence -- it's in servi..."
links.text: All this eloquence -- it's in service of something. She's afraid.

links.title: Half Light: "Beneath the grandness, there is fea..."
links.text: Beneath the grandness, there is fear.

links.title: You: "How are you talking to me?"
links.text: How are you talking to me?

links.title: Shivers: "THE MODULATIONS OF MY VOICE ARE NOT..."
links.text: THE MODULATIONS OF MY VOICE ARE NOTED DOWN WITH THERMOMETERS AND BAROMETERS. YOU FEEL ME IN YOUR NOSTRILS, ON THE LITTLE HAIRS ON THE BACK OF YOUR NECK.

links.title: Shivers: "I ALSO RESIDE IN YOUR LUNGS AND VES..."
links.text: I ALSO RESIDE IN YOUR LUNGS AND VESTIGIAL ORGANS. EVERYWHERE THERE IS SPACE.

links.title: Shivers: "THE MODULATIONS OF MY VOICE ARE NOT..."
links.text: THE MODULATIONS OF MY VOICE ARE NOTED DOWN WITH THERMOMETERS AND BAROMETERS. YOU FEEL ME IN YOUR NOSTRILS, ON THE LITTLE HAIRS ON THE BACK OF YOUR NECK.

links.title: Shivers: "Music pounds through the hall of an..."
links.text: Music pounds through the hall of an old stave church on the coast of Martinaise. Several figures are lost in the beats, their bodies pulled this way and that by sound. One of them, an officer of the RCM, suddenly stops. He appears disoriented, then starts shaking -- violently, no longer in rhythm with the music.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "The beats that had you all fired up..."
links.text: The beats that had you all fired up just a moment ago now seem overwhelming, nauseating. They shift and multiply like pieces of coloured glass in a kaleidoscope.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "You're gripped by panic, alongside..."
links.text: You're gripped by panic, alongside a dizzying feeling of deja vu. Then everything goes silent.

links.title: You: "What's happening to me?"
links.text: What's happening to me?

links.title: Spinal Cord: "Not sure, but it's definitely not a..."
links.text: Not sure, but it's definitely not a normal dance-floor experience. There's something seriously wrong with you, brah.

links.title: You: "I feel like this has happened befor..."
links.text: I feel like this has happened before.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "Could be. It was almost like the ut..."
links.text: Could be. It was almost like the utter unpleasantness of the experience was breaking through the barrier of your recent memory loss...

links.title: Logic: "Maybe your memory loss was caused b..."
links.text: Maybe your memory loss was caused by something like this.

links.title: You: "I should get help."
links.text: I should get help.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "What are you going to do, call the..."
links.text: What are you going to do, call the lazareth again? And if you were to go to a regular hospital... Do you know how long it would take to figure out what's really wrong with you? The interviews, the poking and prodding that you'll undergo?

links.title: Spinal Cord: "All this excitement of dancing and..."
links.text: All this excitement of dancing and dancing harder and even fainting *real* hard is better than dragging your feet from office to office, examination room to examination room, all mercilessly white, bright, and smelling of antiseptic.

links.title: Volition: "Besides, you've got a case to solve..."
links.text: Besides, you've got a case to solve right now, and you won't get to solve it if you turn yourself into a lab rat. Whatever's wrong with you can wait.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "Do you know how long it will take t..."
links.text: Do you know how long it will take to figure out what's really wrong with you? The interviews, the poking and prodding that you'll undergo?

links.title: You: "What happens next?"
links.text: What happens next?

links.title: Spinal Cord: "You'll lay here in complete darknes..."
links.text: You'll lay here in complete darkness for a while, far away from everything and everyone.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "Then consciousness will slowly begi..."
links.text: Then consciousness will slowly begin to return. It won't be fun.

links.title: Spinal Cord: "But you already know -- it rarely i..."
links.text: But you already know -- it rarely is.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Waking up, you see the lieutenant t..."
links.text: Waking up, you see the lieutenant talking to the young people, a worried look on his face.

links.title: Andre: ""I've seen this thing happen before..."
links.text: "I've seen this thing happen before to people partying this hard..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's his leg. Did you know he was..."
links.text: "It's his leg. Did you know he was *shot* just a few days ago? He shouldn't be dancing like a madman, he should be in bed, *resting*."
