links.title: Empathy: "The lieutenant sounds genuinely wor..."
links.text: The lieutenant sounds genuinely worried about you -- and furious with himself, for not stopping you from running around.

links.title: Andre: ""Nah, man, don't worry, he's just d..."
links.text: "Nah, man, don't worry, he's just dehydrated. Happens all the time in night clubs. He'll recover."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It looks pretty dangerous, though.""
links.text: "It looks pretty dangerous, though."

links.title: Andre: ""Nah, man, don't worry, he's mainly..."
links.text: "Nah, man, don't worry, he's mainly dehydrated. It's a regular party reaction, yeah."

links.title: Egg Head: "He bounces up and down, pointing at..."
links.text: He bounces up and down, pointing at you. "Look, he's awake!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? Are you feeling alr..."
links.text: "What happened? Are you feeling alright?"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Your broken hip reminds itself agai..."
links.text: Your broken hip reminds itself again with a dull, but persistent *ache*.

links.title: Andre: ""Oh, there you are, man. Don't worr..."
links.text: "Oh, there you are, man. Don't worry, I've seen this happen before to people partying too hard. You're dehydrated and all."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It's not merely the dehydration --..."
links.text: It's not merely the dehydration -- it's your broken leg, reminding itself again with a dull but persistent ache.

links.title: You: ""Where's Kim?""
links.text: "Where's Kim?"

links.title: Andre: ""Dunno what happened between you gu..."
links.text: "Dunno what happened between you guys, but it was not cool. You should go out and talk to him."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh, there you are, man. Don't worr..."
links.text: "Oh, there you are, man. Don't worry, I've seen this happen before to people partying too hard. You're dehydrated and all. Can you get up?"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It's not merely the dehydration --..."
links.text: It's not merely the dehydration -- it's your broken leg, reminding itself again with a dull but persistent ache.

links.title: Noid: ""Give him a moment." He comes over..."
links.text: "Give him a moment." He comes over with a cup of water and puts it to your lips. "See, this is why you need distilled water."

links.title: You: ""How long was I out for?""
links.text: "How long was I out for?"

links.title: Acele: ""Thirty minutes or so." She raises..."
links.text: "Thirty minutes or so." She raises an amused eyebrow.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""When exactly did you lose consciou..."
links.text: "When exactly did you lose consciousness? When you started shaking or when you were already on the ground?"

links.title: You: ""I think I had a seizure...""
links.text: "I think I had a seizure..."

links.title: Andre: ""Naw, you just raved too hard. The..."
links.text: "Naw, you just raved too hard. The beat gets so hard, you know, and you were rolling super hard on it..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not the beat, he was *shot*,"..."
links.text: "It's not the beat, he was *shot*," the lieutenant says, irritated.

links.title: Noid: ""Has anything like this happened to..."
links.text: "Has anything like this happened to you before? Like... a *seizure*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Has anything like this happened to..."
links.text: "Has anything like this happened to you before?"

links.title: You: ""Maybe this is what happened to me..."
links.text: "Maybe this is what happened to me when I lost my memory..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "Alright, par..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "Alright, party-boy, can you stand?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "That seems likely. Can yo..."
links.text: He nods. "That seems likely. Can you stand?"

links.title: Andre: "Andre shrugs."
links.text: Andre shrugs.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Yup, sounds like a seizure. And you..."
links.text: Yup, sounds like a seizure. And you probably had a more massive one a few days back.

links.title: Conceptualization: "But all kinds of things could be wr..."
links.text: But all kinds of things could be wrong with you at this point -- you've known that much all along. Meanwhile, you still have a killer to catch.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""It did look like you... short-circ..."
links.text: "It did look like you... short-circuited," she says, flipping through printouts.

links.title: You: ""It felt familiar.""
links.text: "It felt familiar."

links.title: Andre: ""With the moves you've got on you -..."
links.text: "With the moves you've got on you -- I don't doubt it!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He ignores the young man. "It very..."
links.text: He ignores the young man. "It very well could be that something similar happened the night you lost your memory. Can you stand?"

links.title: Endurance: "It's not your moves that are at fau..."
links.text: It's not your moves that are at fault, per se. You almost certainly had a seizure just now -- and a much more massive one a few days ago, when you lost your memory.

links.title: Endurance: "You've got to press on with this ca..."
links.text: You've got to press on with this case, though. Just -- take better care of yourself. Don't mix with adolescent drug addicts, maybe?

links.title: You: ""It was intense, but I'm pulling my..."
links.text: "It was intense, but I'm pulling myself together. Boy, I'm all out of juice." (Get up.)

links.title: Noid: ""Give him a moment." He comes over..."
links.text: "Give him a moment." He comes over with a cup of water and puts it to your lips. "You've gotta drink water, man."

links.title: You: ""Guys, I'm out of juice..." (Stop.)"
links.text: "Guys, I'm out of juice..." (Stop.)

links.title: Egg Head: "You might be imagining it but it fe..."
links.text: You might be imagining it but it feels like Egg Head turned the volume down. Such is his respect.

links.title: Andre: ""Man... now... now, man... now..."..."
links.text: "Man... now... now, man... now..." The would-be leader stutters with excitement.

links.title: Andre: ""Now imagine if we could do that, r..."
links.text: "Now imagine if we could do that, right? But with, like, a *thousand* people?"

links.title: Noid: ""End of human development. Mission...."
links.text: "End of human development. Mission. Complete."

links.title: You: ""Right ecstatic!""
links.text: "Right ecstatic!"

links.title: Andre: ""Alright!""
links.text: "Alright!"

links.title: Endurance: "You're absolutely beat. Muscles rel..."
links.text: You're absolutely beat. Muscles relaxed and feet like noodles underneath.

links.title: You: ""I wouldn't go *that* far...""
links.text: "I wouldn't go *that* far..."

links.title: Noid: ""I *WOULD*.""
links.text: "I *WOULD*."

links.title: You: ""Yes. My mission here is complete."..."
links.text: "Yes. My mission here is complete." [Leave.]

links.title: Andre: ""Hope I remember those moves, man!""
links.text: "Hope I remember those moves, man!"

links.title: Noid: ""Don't worry, man. I'll remember th..."
links.text: "Don't worry, man. I'll remember them."
